privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy (Simplified)
privacy_page.intro_p1: We hate incomprehensible legalese. Here is how we treat your data.
privacy_page.data_li1: Your Email: To let you log in.
privacy_page.data_li2: URL and Password (Hash): To make the redirect work. We DO NOT see the page content.
privacy_page.data_li3: Technical Cookies: To keep you logged in.
privacy_page.usage_p1: To make NotionLock work and improve it.
privacy_page.security_p1: SSL encryption everywhere. Passwords hashed with bcrypt (impossible for us to read).
privacy_page.sharing_p1: We don't sell your data. Ever. We only share it with those technically needed (e.g., Stripe for payments).
privacy_page.rights_p1: You can delete everything whenever you want from the dashboard. Your data, your rules.
privacy_page.changes_p1: If we change anything major, we'll write to you.
privacy_page.contact_p1: Doubts? Write to support@notionlock.com. A human answers.
